p.s: The speech delievereddelivered by Michel Barnier, the EU commissioner, in New York at the European American Chamber of Commerce on 10th July 2018 deals with the consequences of Brexit and the Brexit as well.
The speech adressesaddresses the UK and EU with the intention to emphaziseemphasize the EU will not change after the Brexit.
Michel Barnier starts with the leaving of the UK which he is deeply regretingregretting.
The exit will have big consequences for the UK than for the EU but he does not wanted it to come in this way.
He thinks the UK and EU are better together and should stay together.
Barnierexplainesexplains that both sides (EU and UK) will suffer in the part business and they have to be prepare for a time where they will not have a deal.
The financial relationship between the UK and EU have to be closer and he knows how to do this.
The Free Trade Agreement with the UK should include the right of establishment, with EU rules applying.
